rules.content: When ~ enters, choose a creature type, you may behold a creature of the chosen type. If you do, choose a creature card of the chosen type in your graveyard. You may cast that creature this turn.
To behold a creature, choose a creature you control of the chosen type or reveal a creature card from your hand with the chosen type.
Whenever a creature card leaves your graveyard, you gain 1 life and each opponent loses{lns}1 life.
